original_text: There were some teachers there who liked to talk about the things that people should believe. Some of them were called Epicureans and some were called Stoics. After they talked to Paul, some of them said to each other, ‘Who is this silly man? He knows nothing and he talks too much!’ But some of these teachers said, ‘We think that he is talking about strange gods.’ They said this because Paul was telling people the good news about Jesus. He was also talking about the time when God will cause dead people to live again.
korean_text: 어떤 에피쿠로스와 스토아 철학자들도 바울과 쟁론할새 어떤 사람은 이르되 이 말쟁이가 무슨 말을 하고자 하느냐 하고 어떤 사람은 이르되 이방 신들을 전하는 사람인가보다 하니 이는 바울이 예수와 부활을 전하기 때문이러라

sentences.original_text: who liked to talk about the things
Some of them were called Epicureans
some of them said to each other
But some of these teachers said
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이 교사들 중 일부는 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: We think that he is talking about strange gods
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그가 이상한 신들에 대해 이야기한다고 생각한다

sentences.original_text: was telling people the good news about Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들에게 예수에 대한 좋은 소식을 전하고 있었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: He was also talking about the time
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그 시간에 대해 이야기하고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: when God will cause dead people to live again
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 죽은 사람들을 다시 살게 하실 때
